summary: Build an e-learning (Physics Wallah-like) website/app experience for NEET/JEE content where all courses are free, and the user requests complete code for it.
architectural_notes: Scope shift: from generating chapter-wise exam-prep content to building a full PW-like learning platform website/app with free course access (no payments).
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Wordmark logo in a clean academic style (logo-wordmark.dim_1200x300.png)
- App icon with an academic/exam-prep motif (app-icon.dim_512x512.png)
- Hero banner illustration with students/books/physics-chemistry-math-biology elements in a modern flat style (hero-banner.dim_1600x600.png)
- Four subject icons in a consistent style: Physics, Chemistry, Maths, Biology (icon-physics.dim_256x256.png) (icon-chemistry.dim_256x256.png) (icon-maths.dim_256x256.png) (icon-biology.dim_256x256.png)

existing_features.title: Create a PW-like exam-prep web app experience where all courses are free (no pricing, checkout, subscriptions, or payment flows anywhere in the UI).
Implement the core information architecture and navigation for an exam-prep platform: Home, Courses, Course Detail, Subject/Chapter listing, Lesson/Content viewer, and a global search page.

Build a Lesson/Content Viewer page that can render: embedded video (via URL), structured notes (rich text blocks), and a resources section with downloadable static PDFs (served from frontend public assets).
Add basic anonymous progress tracking in the frontend (local-only) so users can mark lessons as completed and see completion status at chapter and course level.
Use React Query for all backend reads (course lists, detail fetches, search) with loading, empty, and error states implemented consistently across pages.

Create a coherent, modern visual theme suitable for an exam-prep brand (distinctive colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) and apply it consistently across the entire app. Avoid blue & purple as primary colors.
Add a lightweight, user-facing legal/footer section with English-only text: ‘All courses are free’ notice, a basic disclaimer, and contact placeholder information.
Add static example resources (PDFs) to the frontend public assets and wire them into at least 4 seeded lessons as downloadable resources.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a Physics Wallah-like exam-prep website/app (NEET/JEE) with all courses free; provide complete codebase.

Define and implement a backend data model in the single Motoko actor to represent free content: Course, Subject, Chapter, Lesson, and resource links (e.g., video URL, PDF URL/filename). Provide query methods to list/search and fetch details.

Seed the backend with a small but realistic starter catalog for NEET/JEE-style prep (at minimum Physics, Chemistry, Maths, Biology) including at least: 4 courses, 8 chapters, and 16 lessons, with a mix of video links and downloadable resources.

projectName: Build a free Physics Wallah-like exam-prep website (no paid courses)
